items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know anything about raising children.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly when Mary will get home.
Tom always walks to school when it isn\'t raining.
Tom and I couldn\'t agree on what we needed to do.
Tom is in the kitchen cooking us something to eat.
Tom is one of the most disagreeable people I know.
Tom is planning on renting a house on Park Street.
I\'ll do my best to have the report ready by 2:30.
I\'m going to give Tom a copy of the book I wrote.
I\'m going to tell Tom what I really think of him.
I\'m willing to pay you a lot of money to do that.
If you have a minute, you might want to read this.
If you want to say something, go ahead and say it.
Imagine yourself having already accomplished that.
In my opinion, French is a hard language to learn.
Tom didn\'t want to play golf with Mary\'s father.
Do you have any pictures of Tom when he was a kid?
Do you think Tom really did this without any help?
Do you want to spend the next ten years in prison?
Tom was the only one aboard the ship when it sank.
